sqls.sql: SELECT row_num, mtr_part_no, mtr_part_idt, mtr_qty, mtr_qty_d, mtr_qty_unit, mtr_waste_rate, mtr_waste_qty_min, mtr_use_qty_min, mtr_priority, mtr_constrain_aps, mtr_origin_type, mtr_kind_rule, mtr_pri_rule, mtr_pr_rule, pd_rmb_mtr_rmk01, pd_rmb_mtr_rmk02, pd_rmb_mtr_rmk03, pd_rmb_mtr_rmk04, pd_rmb_mtr_rmk05, pd_rmb_mtr_rmk06, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM pd_rmb_mtr WHERE unode = @unode;
